summary: Build a full-featured web prototype (frontend + backend) integrating the four foundational campus modules (Daily Pulse, Student Exchange, Explorer’s Guide, Academic Cockpit) with a mock login for demonstration.
architectural_notes: Use mock login (non-production) for initial prototype demonstration.
Frontend currently renders a blank/white screen after mock login on both mobile and desktop; requires a frontend UI/routing rebuild to restore visible module pages.
known_issues: After logging in (mock login), the app shows a blank/white screen with no visible frontend UI on both mobile and desktop.

existing_features.title: Implement a mock login flow for demonstration that allows users to choose a display name and proceed into the app, with an explicit “Demo / Mock Login” indicator in the UI.

Create an integrated app shell (navigation + routing) that exposes the four foundational modules as first-class sections: Daily Pulse, Student Exchange, Explorer’s Guide, and Academic Cockpit, all accessible after mock login.

Implement the Daily Pulse module backend + UI with: (1) Live Mess Menu that supports daily menus and browsing by date, and (2) a Mail Summarizer that converts long pasted email text into one-sentence action items/notices using local heuristic summarization (no external AI APIs).

Implement the Student Exchange module backend + UI with three sections: (1) Lost & Found postings (create + list + detail), (2) Buy/Sell Marketplace listings (create + list + detail with basic fields like title, price, category, description), and (3) Travel Sharing (cab-pool coordinator) trips (create + list + join/leave trip).

Implement the Explorer’s Guide module backend + UI as a Nearby Hub directory of places (eateries/attractions/hidden spots) with user ratings and reviews, including a list view and a place detail page.
Implement the Academic Cockpit module backend + UI as a Live Timetable: users can add/edit/delete class entries (course name, day/time, location) and view them in a timetable/schedule format.

Provide a consistent, creative visual theme (colors, typography, layout, component styling) for the entire app (login, navigation, all module pages) and apply it uniformly (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).
Generate and include static visual assets for branding and UI polish, and render them from the frontend as static files (not via backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create full-stack website prototype integrating the four foundational modules into one product
Implement mock login/authentication flow for demonstration purposes
Daily Pulse module: Live Mess Menu + AI/ML mail/email summarizer + campus info feed elements
Student Exchange module: Lost & Found + Buy/Sell marketplace + Travel sharing (cab-pool coordinator)
Explorer’s Guide module: Nearby Hub directory with ratings/reviews and discovery features
Academic Cockpit module: Live Timetable with customization and update handling

Add backend persistence in the single Motoko main actor for all module data (mess menus, summarized mail history if stored, lost&found posts, marketplace listings, travel trips + participants, places + reviews, and per-user timetable), keyed by the mock user identity.

projectName: Campus Super-App Prototype: Four Modules Integrated with Mock Login
